title: Asset Structural Characteristics
description: Describes the form of an Asset along with attributes specific to that Asset's form

identifier.description: Identifies the essence of the asset

structuralType.title: Structural Type
structuralType.description: A structured description of the the assets form

essenceVersion.title: Essence Version
essenceVersion.description: The version of the essence represented

parameters.title: Structural Properties
parameters.description: A set of properties that describe the asset in this form

representation.description: References a different representation of the essence

revision.description: References a revised version of this essence

revisedFrom.description: References the essence from which this was revised

$defs.title: Structural Properties
$defs.description: A set of properties that describe attributes specific to the Asset

assetGroup.title: Asset Group
assetGroup.description: An Asset that is comprised of other Assets or Asset Groups and treated as a single unit

isOrdered.title: Assets are ordered
isOrdered.description: True when the Assets in the group are ordered

fileDetails.title: File Details
fileDetails.description: Properties relating to how an asset may be used in file system

fileExtension.title: File Extension
fileExtension.description: The file extension for the asset, often a 3 or 4 letter code that typically indicates the encoding format

sourceReference.title: Source Reference
sourceReference.description: A set of terms that describe the source of the image, such as url, the name of publication, stock library etc.

format.title: Image format
format.description: The format the image is available in
